summary_text.summary_text_1: I am a professional, dedicated, and well-versed front-end designer, developer, and problem solver. I have comprehensive experience that spans a wide spectrum of development and design principles, technologies and practices. A flexible team player with a collaborative and creative approach to systematic problem solving. With a primary objective to create innovative and bullet-proof user experiences that captivate and engage audiences.

summary_text.summary_text_2: By consistently pursuing industry knowledge, refining my skill sets, and expanding my experience and adaptability, I am able to deliver high-quality and efficiently executed work across a wide range of business domains.
